questions.question: Do you often feel tired, dizziness, or short of breath even when you haven't done much physical work?
Have you seen your skin, lips, or nails look paler than usual recently?
Do your hands or feet feel cold even when the weather is warm?
Do you have a family history of Diabetes
Do you often feel very thirsty even after drinking enough water?
Do you need to urinate very often, including during the night?
Have you lost or gained weight recently without any clear reason?
